original_text: And he passed through the hill country of Ephraim and passed through the land of Shalishah, but they did not find them. And they passed through the land of Shaalim, but they were not there. Then they passed through the land of Benjamin, but did not find them.
korean_text: 그가 에브라임 산지와 살리사 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하고 사알림 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 그 곳에는 없었고 베냐민 사람의 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: And he passed through the hill country of Ephraim
and passed through the land of Shalishah
but they did not find them
And they passed through the land of Shaalim
Then they passed through the land of Benjamin
